thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com | 5 of 160
thread.title: Jon

author: Jon
title: Jon
text:
I had a HORRENDOUS experience with a Lenscrafters store and dealt with Store, Manager, Regional Manager, and Corporate regarding two pairs of Oakley Crosslink MNP glasses. I had complained to store initially regarding store workers and was told by the Manager that I would be given an employee discount to come back and complete my purchase. I gave them a chance but was targeted by store workers who stole from me and processed bogus claims against my insurance. REAL CLASS.
Smartbuyglasses.com was a breath of fresh air. Everything was done correctly, easy to use and understand and I will buy from them again, very soon. I'm just waiting for my rewards to hit my account and I'm ordering another pair.
Thank you to all of your staff for such a wonderful experience.
